title: coolant-temperature-indication-A26D1C
htmlContent:
Coolant Temperature Indication  

The coolant temperature is shown in the liquid crystal display (LCD) in the instrument assembly (see Section 13.5 "Instruments Assembly"). The LCD is driven by a signal from the Multec control unit, which receives a coolant temperature signal from the coolant temperature sensor (see Section 9.14.2.3 "Coolant Temperature Sensor") in the thermostat housing.
